mapper.select: SELECT a.achievement_id, a.title, a.description, UPPER(a.condition_type) as achievement_type, 0 as achievement_value, a.icon_url, a.reward_gallery_id, IF(ua.achieved_at IS NOT NULL, true, false) as is_achieved, ua.achieved_at, 0 as current_value FROM achievement a LEFT JOIN user_achievement ua ON a.achievement_id = ua.achievement_id AND ua.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.achievement_id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_achievement (user_id, achievement_id, achieved_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{achievementId}, #{achievedAt})
